full_text: A man who made threats against Dr. Anthony Fauci over the U.S.’s Covid-19 response was sentenced to roughly three years in federal prison https://t.co/WZNVFQ5R38

localize.full_text: 米国のCovid-19対応を巡ってAnthony Fauci博士を脅迫した男に、連邦刑務所で約3年の刑を宣告https://t.co/WZNVFQ5R38。
一名因美国的Covid-19对策而对Anthony Fauci博士进行威胁的男子被判处大约三年的联邦监禁 https://t.co/WZNVFQ5R38
一名因美國的Covid-19對策而對Anthony Fauci博士進行威脅的男子被判處大約三年的聯邦監禁 https://t.co/WZNVFQ5R38
